_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Training to be done by the sick househol: Not to grasp the eye, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the eye
Not to grasp the ear, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the ear
Not to grasp the nose, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the nose
Not to grasp the tongue, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the tongue
Not to grasp the body, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the body
Not to grasp the mind, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the mind
Not to grasp sight, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on sight
Not to grasp sound, smell, taste, touch, thought, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on thought
Not to grasp eye consciousness, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on eye consciousness
Not to grasp ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, mind consciousness, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on mind consciousness
Not to grasp eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, mind contact, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on mind contact

Not to grasp feeling born of eye contact, feeling born of ear contact, feeling born of nose contact, feeling born of tongue contact, feeling born of body contact, feeling born of mind contact, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the feeling born of mind contact
Not to grasp the earth element, water element, fire element, air element, space element, consciousness element, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the consciousness element
Not to grasp form, feeling, perception, choices, consciousness, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on consciousness

Not to grasp the dimension of infinite space, the dimension of infinite consciousness, the dimension of nothingness, the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
Not to grasp this world, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on this world
Not to grasp the other world, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on the other world
Not to grasp whatever is seen, heard, thought, known, sought, and explored by my mind, and there shall be no consciousness of mine dependent on that.
